history.proof: srun best use: Nat.le_0_l, sum_n_Sm unfold: sum_n.

exceptions.tactic: apply Nat.le_0_r in H as Hnm.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hnm was not found in the current environment.

In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n : nat Unable to unify "((?M2434 <= 0)%nat -> ?M2434 = 0%nat) /\\ (?M2434 = 0%nat -> (?M2434 <= 0)%nat)" with "sum_n a (S n) = plus (a (S n)) (sum_n a n)".
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n : nat Unable to unify "(0 <= ?M2434)%nat" with "sum_n a (S n) = plus (a (S n)) (sum_n a n)".

original: intros H. apply Nat.le_0_r in H as Hnm. symmetry in Hnm. rewrite <- Hnm. rewrite sum_n_n. rewrite plus_comm. apply Nat.le_0_r. apply Nat.le_0_l.
